Browse the source code of netbsd/external/mpl/bind/dist/bin/tools/arpaname.c

1/* $NetBSD: arpaname.c,v 1.3 2019/01/09 16:55:05 christos Exp $ */
2
3/*

13
14
15#include <config.h>
16
17#include <isc/net.h>
18#include <isc/print.h>
19
20#include <stdio.h>
21
22#define UNUSED(x) (void)&(x)
23
24int
25main(int argc, char *argv[]) {
26 unsigned char buf[16];
27 int i;
28
29 UNUSED(argc);
30
31 while (argv[1]) {
32 if (inet_pton(AF_INET6, argv[1], buf) == 1) {
33 for (i = 15; i >= 0; i--)
34 fprintf(stdout, "%X.%X.", buf[i] & 0xf,
35 (buf[i] >> 4) & 0xf);
36 fprintf(stdout, "IP6.ARPA\n");
37 argv++;
38 continue;
39 }
40 if (inet_pton(AF_INET, argv[1], buf) == 1) {
41 fprintf(stdout, "%u.%u.%u.%u.IN-ADDR.ARPA\n",
42 buf[3], buf[2], buf[1], buf[0]);
43 argv++;
44 continue;
45 }
46 return (1);
47 }
48 fflush(stdout);
49 return(ferror(stdout));
50}
51
